parameters.fetchXml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<fetch>
  <entity name="mpa_lm_leavecredit">
    <attribute name="mpa_lm_leavecreditid" />
    <attribute name="mpa_name" />
    <attribute name="mpa_vacationhoursremaining" />
    <attribute name="mpa_sickhoursremaining" />
    <attribute name="mpa_unpaidleavehoursremaining" />
    <filter>
      <condition entityname="mpa_lm_leavecredit" attribute="ownerid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Update_a_leave_request_approval_status_to_Cancelled')?['body/_ownerid_value']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<fetch>
  <entity name="mpa_lm_leavecredit">
    <attribute name="mpa_lm_leavecreditid" />
    <attribute name="mpa_name" />
    <attribute name="mpa_vacationhoursremaining" />
    <attribute name="mpa_sickhoursremaining" />
    <attribute name="mpa_unpaidleavehoursremaining" />
    <filter>
      <condition entityname="mpa_lm_leavecredit" attribute="ownerid" operator="eq" value="@{body('Parse_approval_details')?['RequestorId']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<fetch top="1">
  <entity name="mpa_lm_leavecredit" alias="lc">
    <attribute name="mpa_lm_leavecreditid" />
    <attribute name="mpa_name" />
    <attribute name="mpa_vacationhoursremaining" />
    <attribute name="mpa_sickhoursremaining" />
    <attribute name="mpa_unpaidleavehoursremaining" />
    <filter>
      <condition entityname="mpa_lm_leavecredit" attribute="ownerid" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Cancel_a_leave_request_record_in_Leave_Request_table')?['body/_ownerid_value']}" />
    </filter>
    <link-entity name="mpa_lm_leavetype" from="mpa_lm_leavetypeid" to="mpa_leavetypeid" link-type="inner" alias="leavetype" visible="true">
      <attribute name="mpa_lm_leavetypeid" />
      <attribute name="mpa_leavetypename" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

inputs.name: SubjectEmployee
inputs.value: Your new leave request has been submitted

inputs.name: MessageEmployee
inputs.value: I have notified your approver of the new leave request you submitted.

inputs.name: MessageManager
inputs.value: @{outputs('Get_Employee_by_Id_in_Users_table')?['body/fullname']} has submitted a new leave request.

inputs.name: SubjectManager
inputs.value: New leave request has been submitted

inputs.name: MessageEmployee
inputs.value: I have notified your approver of the update you made in your leave request.

inputs.name: SubjectEmployee
inputs.value: Your leave request has been approved

inputs.name: MessageEmployee
inputs.value: Your leave request has been approved.

inputs.name: MessageManager
inputs.value: You approved the leave request of @{outputs('Get_Employee_by_Id_in_Users_table')?['body/fullname']}.

inputs.name: SubjectEmployee
inputs.value: Your leave request has been rejected

inputs.name: MessageEmployee
inputs.value: Your leave request has been rejected.

inputs.name: MessageManager
inputs.value: You rejected the leave request of @{outputs('Get_Employee_by_Id_in_Users_table')?['body/fullname']}.

Compose_email_body_style.inputs:
<style>
            table {
                border-collapse: collapse;
            }

            .tablerow {
                border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
                height: 60px;
            }

            .fieldcol {
                width: 210px;
                color: #101828;
                font-weight: 600;
                font-family: Inter, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 16px;
                line-height: 24px;
                text-align: left;
            }

            .valuecol {
                width: 340px;
                color: #101828;
                font-family: Inter, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 15px;
                line-height: 24px;
                text-align: left;
            }

            .reminder {
                color: #d13438;
                font-family: Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 12px;
                line-height: 16px;
                text-align: left;
            }

            .subject {
                color: #6461f2;
                font-weight: 600;
                font-family: Inter, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 16px;
                line-height: 24px;
                text-align: left;
            }

            .message {
                color: #667085;
                font-family: Inter, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 15px;
                line-height: 24px;
                margin: 0px;
            }

            .floatleft{
                float: left;
            }

            .xsmall-image{
                min-width:16px;
                width:16px;
                height: auto;
                display: block;
            }

            .small-image {
                min-width:48px;
                width:48px;
                height: auto;
                display: block;
            }

            .big-image {
                min-width:128px; 
                width:128px; 
                height: auto; 
                display: block;
            }

            .title {
                color:#101828;
                font-weight:600;
                font-family:Inter,Arial,sans-serif;
                font-size:16px;
                line-height:24px;
                text-align:left;
                padding-top: 12px;
            }

            .title-align {
                margin-left: 75px;
            }

            .alink {
                color:#6461f2;
                text-decoration:none;
                font-family:Inter,Arial,sans-serif;
                font-size:15px;
                line-height:24px;
                text-align:left;
            }

            .card-title {
                padding-left: 150px;
                color: #101828;
                font-weight: 600;
                font-family: Inter, Arial, sans-serif;
                font-size: 20px;
                line-height: 28px;
                text-align: left;
                margin-bottom: 5px;
            }

            .card-subtitle {
                padding-left: 150px;
                margin-bottom: 20px;
            }

            .card-body {
                padding-left: 150px;
                margin-bottom: 10px;
            }

            .card-body-txt {
                margin-left: 25px;
            }

            .card-body-image {
                padding-top: 4px;
                float: left;
            }
        </style>

Compose_email_body_template_for_manager.inputs:
This is a system-generated email. This mailbox is not monitored.

Please do not reply to this message. For concerns or inquiries, please get in touch with the project manager below or HR Support via: hremail@domain.com


Leave Management Copilot

@{variables('SubjectManager')}


Hi!

Im Leave Management Copilot!

@{variables('MessageManager')}


Leave type
@{outputs('Get_Leave_Request')['body/mpa_leavetype@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}
Leave start date
@{outputs('Get_Leave_Request')['body/mpa_leavestartdateutc@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}
Leave end date
@{outputs('Get_Leave_Request')['body/mpa_leaveenddateutc@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}
Requested hours
@{outputs('Get_Leave_Request')['body/mpa_hoursrequested']}
Available balance hours
@{outputs('Compose_Hours_Available')}
Submitted By
@{outputs('Get_Employee_by_Id_in_Users_table')?['body/fullname']}
Employees Comments
@{coalesce(outputs('Get_Leave_Request')['body']?['mpa_requestorcomments'], 'none')}
Managers Comments
@{coalesce(outputs('Get_Leave_Request')['body']?['mpa_approvalcomments'], 'none')}


Leave Management Copilot
Automatic Mail Notification
email@example.com
example.com
